post.body: I've got that on a T-shirt!
probably.
Well thank you. I like being #100, or other multiples of ten.
You mean the painter Bob Ross?
coffee. bananas. cats.
random person. your twitter seemed interesting.
I am unfollowing you. Nothing personal, just our interests are different.
Happy Birthday then.
Twittered about a Craigslist ad? I think you folded the internet.
I just spent the last 20 minutes making new tabs. Hope you are happy.
that makes sense. eating salami. ate 9 hours ago..
agreed
http://tinyurl.com/8kaq2e
congrats
Hmm...yes. I think I have a shell script working here. Maybe one day I'll grow up to be a real Unix user.
YAY. Good database systems with PHP-GTK2. Maybe I can do some custom coding on Ubuntu and get a dedicated infrastructure system.
My desktop pattern is nearly 60 weeks old. I used to change it every week. When did I stop caring?
Looking at some very old maps. I forgot how complex New York always was.
Woo. New Apple stuff makes me happy. Bad economy makes me sad.
Exercise. Oww.
